theme: Professional B2B SaaS, modern, data-driven, trustworthy, innovative. Clean, minimal, sophisticated dashboard interface focused on research insights and analytics.
target_audience: Product managers, UX researchers, marketing teams, and data analysts

primary.usage: Primary CTAs, links, brand elements, active states

accent.usage: Data visualizations, special highlights, research indicators

icon_system.approach: Inline SVG via data-lucide attributes. Icons only - NO generated images for this web app.
icon_system.color_usage: Inherit from parent or use theme colors

when_to_generate: NEVER - This is a web application dashboard
Web apps should use icons, not decorative images
Data visualization should use charts/graphs, not images
User profiles may use avatar placeholders (geometric shapes/initials)
when_to_skip: ALWAYS - This is a data-focused SaaS dashboard
All UI elements use icons from Lucide library
Research insights shown via charts/tables/data viz
No hero images, no feature illustrations, no background images
style_preferences: Use icons exclusively for visual communication
Data visualizations via Chart.js or similar library
Avatar placeholders: colored circles with initials
Empty states: icons + text, no illustrations

aspect_ratios.avatar_placeholder: 1:1 (square) - use CSS initials or Lucide user icon

imagery.prompt_template: NOT APPLICABLE - Icons only, no image generation for this web app
imagery.file_path_convention: NOT APPLICABLE - Use Lucide icons via data-lucide attributes

glassmorphism.usage: Navigation bars, modal overlays, stat cards on gradient backgrounds

primary.classes: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white px-6 py-2.5 rounded-lg transition-all duration-300 font-medium shadow-md hover:shadow-lg
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, main actions (Start Research, Create Survey, etc.)

secondary.classes: bg-white hover:bg-slate-50 text-slate-900 px-6 py-2.5 rounded-lg transition-all duration-300 border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md font-medium
secondary.usage: Secondary actions, cancel buttons, alternative choices

text.classes: text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-700 transition-colors duration-200 font-medium px-2 py-1

base.classes: bg-white rounded-xl p-6 shadow-md border border-slate-200 transition-all duration-300
base.usage: Research insight cards, data containers, persona cards

interactive.classes: bg-white rounded-xl p-6 shadow-md border border-slate-200 hover:shadow-lg hover:border-blue-200 transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer
interactive.usage: Clickable research items, survey cards, interactive elements

stat.classes: bg-white rounded-xl p-6 shadow-md border border-slate-200
stat.usage: Dashboard stat cards showing metrics and KPIs

navigation.container: bg-white border-b border-slate-200 fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 z-50 shadow-sm
navigation.link: text-slate-700 hover:text-blue-600 transition-colors duration-200 font-medium px-4 py-2
navigation.sidebar: bg-white border-r border-slate-200 w-64 h-screen fixed left-0 top-16 p-4

forms.input: w-full px-4 py-2.5 rounded-lg border border-slate-300 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-200 transition-all outline-none bg-white text-slate-900
forms.label: block text-sm font-medium text-slate-700 mb-2
forms.textarea: w-full px-4 py-2.5 rounded-lg border border-slate-300 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-200 transition-all outline-none bg-white text-slate-900 resize-vertical

tables.container: bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md border border-slate-200 overflow-hidden

badges.base: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium

sidebar_layouts.sidebar: w-64 bg-white border-r border-slate-200 fixed left-0 top-16 bottom-0 overflow-y-auto p-4

design_rationale.color_choices: Blue (#3b82f6) chosen as primary for trust and professionalism—essential for research platforms handling user data. Purple (#8b5cf6) adds modern tech credibility. Cyan accent (#06b6d4) provides data-focused visual interest without overwhelming. This palette balances Linear's tech sophistication with Notion's clean professionalism.
design_rationale.typography_choice: Inter selected for exceptional dashboard readability and professional SaaS aesthetic. Widely adopted in modern B2B products (Linear, Notion, Stripe), it ensures clarity for data-heavy interfaces. Multiple weights support clear hierarchy from stat numbers to body text.
design_rationale.icon_strategy: Lucide provides comprehensive icon coverage for research/data contexts (users, charts, insights). Stroke-based style maintains consistency across all UI states. CRITICAL: This is a web app—icons only, no generated images. All visual communication via icons, charts, and typography.
design_rationale.imagery_approach: WEB APP - ICONS ONLY. No generated images. This is a dashboard/tool interface where: (1) User profiles = avatar placeholders with initials, (2) Data insights = charts/graphs via libraries, (3) Research results = tables/lists with icons, (4) Empty states = large icons + text. Following Linear's data-focused approach where functionality > decoration.
design_rationale.effects_rationale: Subtle glassmorphism on navigation maintains hierarchy without distraction. Premium shadow system adds depth to data cards. Smooth 300ms transitions create polished interactions expected in professional tools. Gradients used sparingly for hero sections only—dashboard remains clean and functional like Linear's interface.
